pages.text: Komodo dragons are light greenish-brown color creatures and they are hostile creatures with the players.$(br2)They can be tamed with a stack of Rotten Flesh and then can be ridden and will fight for the player.$(br2)When attack a prey, a tamed Komodo Dragon will ignore all commands from the player.
